name: ButtonBadgeDesign
description: Determines where the badge will be placed and how it will be styled.

values.name: InlineText
values.description: The badge is displayed after the text, inside the button.
values._jsDoc:
/**
 * The badge is displayed after the text, inside the button.
 * @public
 */

values.name: OverlayText
values.description:
The badge is displayed at the top-end corner of the button.

**Note:** According to design guidance, the OverlayText design mode is best used in cozy density to avoid potential visual issues in compact.
values._jsDoc:
/**
 * The badge is displayed at the top-end corner of the button.

**Note:** According to design guidance, the OverlayText design mode is best used in cozy density to avoid potential visual issues in compact.
 * @public
 */

values.name: AttentionDot
values.description: The badge is displayed as an attention dot.
values._jsDoc:
/**
 * The badge is displayed as an attention dot.
 * @public
 */

_jsDoc:
/**
 * Determines where the badge will be placed and how it will be styled.
 * @enum {string}
 * @public
 * @alias undefined."@ui5".webcomponents.ButtonBadgeDesign
 * @ui5-module-override undefined/@ui5/webcomponents ButtonBadgeDesign
 */
